toast.updateSuccessDescription: Application status has been updated to {{status}}.

FiProductCreatePage.title: Create Financial Product
FiProductCreatePage.description: Define a new loan or grant product to be offered to farmers.

form.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the product, its benefits, and who is eligible.
form.targetRolesDescription: Select the roles eligible for this product.

toast.notAuthenticated: You must be logged in as a Financial Institution.

FiProductsPage.title: Financial Products
FiProductsPage.description: View and manage your loan and grant products.
FiProductsPage.noProducts: You have not created any financial products yet.

hero.title: Rebuilding Global Food Supply Chains with {appName}
hero.subtitle: Connecting farmers, buyers, and every stakeholder in between with transparency, technology, and trust.

features.title: A Unified Platform for a Connected Supply Chain
features.subtitle: DamDoh brings every aspect of the agricultural value chain into a single, intelligent ecosystem.

networking.title: Professional Network
networking.description: Connect directly with farmers, exporters, financiers, and service providers from around the world.

marketplace.title: Global Marketplace
marketplace.description: Buy and sell produce, inputs, and equipment with confidence, backed by verifiable data.

forums.title: Knowledge Forums
forums.description: Share insights, ask questions, and collaborate with a global community of agricultural experts.

talent.title: Talent Exchange
talent.description: Find or offer specialized agricultural services, from agronomy consulting to logistics.

forWho.title: Empowering Every Link in the Chain
forWho.description: DamDoh is built for the entire agricultural ecosystem. Whether you're tending a small plot or managing international trade, our platform provides the tools you need to succeed.
forWho.imageAlt: A diverse group of agricultural professionals collaborating.

farmers.title: Farmers & Cooperatives
farmers.description: Access new markets, secure financing, and utilize best practices to increase yield and profitability.

buyers.title: Buyers & Exporters
buyers.description: Source high-quality, traceable produce directly from producers and streamline your supply chain.

experts.title: Experts & Service Providers
experts.description: Offer your expertise, find new clients, and contribute to a more efficient and sustainable food system.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Agri-Business?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of stakeholders who are building a more transparent and prosperous agricultural future.

AppFooter.tagline: Connecting the agricultural world, from seed to table.

talentExchangePage.title: Talent Exchange
talentExchangePage.description: Find skilled agricultural professionals or offer your expertise.
talentExchangePage.noResultsDescription: Try adjusting your search filters or be the first to list a service in this category.

myNetworkPage.connectionsDescription: Your network of trusted partners on DamDoh.
myNetworkPage.noConnections: You haven't made any connections yet. Start by exploring the network!
myNetworkPage.requestsDescription: Accept or decline requests to grow your network.
myNetworkPage.noRequests: You have no pending connection requests.

InsuranceProductsPage.description: View and manage your insurance product offerings.
InsuranceProductsPage.noProducts: You have not created any insurance products yet.

form.descriptionPlaceholder: Briefly describe what this product covers.
form.coveragePlaceholder: Detail the specific perils, coverage limits, and deductibles.

toast.notAuthenticated: You must be logged in as an Insurance Provider.

AgriTechDashboard.title: Agri-Tech & Developer Hub
AgriTechDashboard.integrationsDescription: View and manage your ongoing integration projects.

sustainabilityPage.title: Sustainability Dashboard
sustainabilityPage.description: Track and manage your farm's environmental impact and sustainable practices.

auth.title: Authentication Required
auth.description: You need to be logged in to view your sustainability dashboard.

noData.title: No Data Available
noData.description: We don't have any sustainability data for your profile yet. Start by logging activities on your farm.
